00169 @class JRActivityObject;
00170 
00171 @interface JRSessionData : NSObject <JRConnectionManagerDelegate>
00172 {
00173     NSMutableArray *delegates;
00174 
00175     JRProvider *currentProvider;
00176     NSString   *returningBasicProvider;
00177     NSString   *returningSocialProvider;
00178 
00179 /*  allProviders is a dictionary of JRProviders, where each JRProvider contains the information specific to that
00180     provider. basicProviders and socialProviders are arrays of NSStrings, each string being the primary key in allProviders
00181     for that provider, representing the list of providers to be used in authentication and social publishing.
00182     The arrays are in the order configured by the RP on http://rpxnow.com. */
00183     NSMutableDictionary *allProviders;
00184     NSArray             *basicProviders;
00185     NSArray             *socialProviders;
00186     NSMutableDictionary *authenticatedUsersByProvider;
00187 
00188  /* These values are used by sessionData to determine if the cached configuration is dirty or not.  As both the code and
00189     the configuration information (mostly regarding RP's chosen providers) will rarely change, the library caches the
00190     information so that it can use it immediately.  The http etag of the mobile_config_and_baseurl action indicates if the
00191     downloaded configuration information has changes, and the git commit value stored in JREngage-info.plist indicates if
00192     the code itself has changed. */
00193     NSString *savedConfigurationBlock;
00194     NSString *newEtag;
00195     NSString *gitCommit;
00196 
00197  /* So that customers can add new providers without rereleasing their code, the library dynamically downloads any of the
00198     icons it may be missing.  Once the library knows that a provider has all of it's icons, it adds the provider's name
00199     to the providersWithIcons set.  If a provider doesn't have its icons, the icon urls are added to the iconsStillNeeded
00200     dictionary with the provider as the key.  This dictionary is saved between launches, in case the downloading of the
00201     icons fails, is interrupted, etc. */
00202     NSMutableSet        *providersWithIcons;
00203     NSMutableDictionary *iconsStillNeeded;
00204 
00205  /* The activity that the calling application is trying to share */
00206     JRActivityObject *activity;
00207 
00208  /* Server and RP properties */
00209     NSString *tokenUrl;
00210     NSString *baseUrl;
00211     NSString *appId;
00212     NSString *device;
00213 
00214     BOOL hidePoweredBy;
00215 
00216     // Question to self: What is the behavior of this (i.e., how does it affect social publishing?)
00217     // when selected during a basic authentication call?
00218     BOOL authenticatingDirectlyOnThisProvider;
00219     BOOL alwaysForceReauth;
00220     BOOL forceReauthJustThisTime;
00221 
00222     BOOL canRotate;
00223 
00224  /* TRUE if the library is currently sharing an activity */
00225     BOOL socialSharing;
00226 
00227  /* TRUE if either of the the library's dialogs are loaded */
00228     BOOL dialogIsShowing;
00229 
00230     BOOL stillNeedToShortenUrls;
00231 
00232  /* Because configuration errors aren't reported until the calling application needs the library,
00233     we save this event in an instance variable. */
00234     NSError  *error;
00235 
00236 }
00237 @property (retain)   JRProvider *currentProvider;
00238 @property (readonly) NSString   *returningBasicProvider;
00239 @property (readonly) NSString   *returningSocialProvider;
00240 
00241 @property (readonly) NSMutableDictionary *allProviders;
00242 @property (readonly) NSArray             *basicProviders;
00243 @property (readonly) NSArray             *socialProviders;
00244 
00245 @property (copy)     JRActivityObject *activity;
00246 
00247 @property (copy)     NSString *tokenUrl;
00248 @property (readonly) NSString *baseUrl;
00249 
00250 @property (readonly) BOOL hidePoweredBy;
00251 @property            BOOL alwaysForceReauth;
00252 @property            BOOL forceReauthJustThisTime;
00253 @property            BOOL authenticatingDirectlyOnThisProvider;
00254 @property            BOOL socialSharing;
00255 @property            BOOL dialogIsShowing;
00256 @property            BOOL canRotate;
00257 @property (retain, readonly) NSError *error;
00258

00272 - (JRProvider*)getSocialProviderAtIndex:(NSUInteger)index;

00274

00298
